activity_recs.title: Explore Eden Park
activity_recs.description: A scenic urban park with walking trails, a beautiful lake, and the Cincinnati Art Museum nearby.
activity_recs.reasoning: Your interest in parks aligns well with Eden Park, offering both natural beauty and cultural attractions.

activity_recs.title: Tour the Cincinnati Art Museum
activity_recs.description: World-class art collection housed in a scenic, architecturally notable setting within Eden Park.
activity_recs.reasoning: Engages both your cultural and intellectual interests, with American, European, and local artworks.

activity_recs.title: Night Out at Longfellow Bar
activity_recs.description: A bar offering unique cocktails and Ohio's largest rum selection, located in a historic building.
activity_recs.reasoning: Your interest in bars will be satisfied with its extensive drink menu and historical significance.

activity_recs.title: Visit the Cincinnati Zoo & Botanical Garden
activity_recs.description: One of the oldest zoos in the U.S., known for its endangered species programs and extensive botanical garden.
activity_recs.reasoning: Combines your interests in tech and nature, providing insights into animal care technologies and beautiful natural settings.

activity_recs.title: Relax at Smale Riverfront Park
activity_recs.description: A bustling park with river views, playgrounds, walking paths, and interactive fountains.
activity_recs.reasoning: Perfect for a summer day out, offering a variety of outdoor activities and scenic river views.

activity_recs.title: Enjoy a Day at Summit Park
activity_recs.description: A large park featuring walking trails, a playground, and various community events throughout the summer.
activity_recs.reasoning: Perfect for summer activities and enjoying the outdoors, matching your interest in parks.

activity_recs.title: Discover Tech at Union Terminal
activity_recs.description: Visit the Cincinnati Museum Center at Union Terminal, featuring exhibits on history, science, and technology.
activity_recs.reasoning: Aligns with your tech interests and offers educational exhibits in a historic setting.

activity_recs.title: Attend a Cincinnati Reds Baseball Game
activity_recs.description: Experience the excitement of Major League Baseball at Great American Ball Park.
activity_recs.reasoning: A classic summer activity that fits your medium budget and adds a local sport experience to your itinerary.

activity_recs.title: Experience the Vibe at Somerset Bar
activity_recs.description: A unique cocktail bar set in a sprawling exotic garden and conservatory.
activity_recs.reasoning: Combines your love for bars with a unique garden setting, making for a memorable night out.

activity_recs.title: Attend a Festival at Riverfest
activity_recs.description: End-of-summer celebration with a 30-minute fireworks display over the Ohio River.
activity_recs.reasoning: A perfect way to end your summer trip with a bang, literally, offering a festive atmosphere.
